type: Legendary Creature – High Entia Human Noble
rules_text:
Melia enters the with three +1/+1 counters on it.
[i]Topple[/i] - {W}, Remove a counter from a creature or artifact you control: Choose one –
• Counter target spell or ability that targets a creature you control unless that spell’s controller pays {1}.
• Target attacking creature you control gains first strike until end of turn.
• Gain 1 life.
